name: Escape From Huwan
description:
Controls:

WASD + Mouse

Story:

You are a gorilla. You have been caged your entire life, while scientists tested if various viruses you carry could be transmissible to humans. One day you break out of your cage, and must escape the complex!

Notes:

My entry for #LOWREZJAM 2021. I made this mainly as a practical test of my own web-based IDE, GameBeans. It's rather short as I skipped several days, for reasons. But it's not the worst thing I've ever made! :P

Music by my friend, Francis Fonye.

SFX from various free sources.
